+ // Function to populate the HTML elements with data
+ function populatePage(data) {
+     // Header Stats
+     document.getElementById('total-calls').innerText = data.history.todayStats.processed;
+     document.getElementById('generated-summaries').innerText = data.history.todayStats.processed; // Assuming generated = processed for this demo
+     document.getElementById('avg-process-time').innerText = data.history.todayStats.avgTime;
+     document.getElementById('summary-accuracy').innerText = data.history.todayStats.qualityScore; // Using quality score as proxy for accuracy in header
+     document.getElementById('time-saved').innerText = "52.1"; // Placeholder, calculate if needed
+     
+     document.getElementById('stt-status').innerText = "ğŸŸ¢ æ­£å¸¸"; // Static for demo
+     document.getElementById('nlp-status').innerText = "ğŸŸ¢ æ­£å¸¸"; // Static for demo
+     document.getElementById('summary-status').innerText = "ğŸŸ¢ æ­£å¸¸"; // Static for demo
+     document.getElementById('integration-status').innerText = "ğŸŸ¢ æ­£å¸¸"; // Static for demo
+
